classification.task_goal: Search Google for the current composition of the S&P500 and output all 500 members in short form.
primary_constraints: Output only the names of the companies in short form.
classification.reasoning: The assistant failed to perform the task as requested by the user, specifically by not executing a Google search and providing the names of the S&P500 companies. The user later accepted this failure and did not enforce the constraint of outputting only the names.
